alert.note: Alert for Coos; Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 6:56AM EST until December 21 at 4:30AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Vermont...New Hampshire... Connecticut River Near Dalton affecting Grafton, Caledonia, Coos and Essex Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Connecticut River near Dalton. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
